segment.source: There comes a point when either an employee parts way with the company, or with their device.
segment.target: There comes a point when either an employee parts way with the company, or with their device.

segment.source: In such cases, you need to be able to ensure that neither the employee nor anyone using their device can access company resources.
segment.target: In such cases, you need to be able to ensure that neither the employee nor anyone using their device can access company resources.

segment.source: You may also want to make sure that any company information on the device is removed.
segment.target: You may also want to make sure that any company information on the device is removed.

segment.source: Intune provides comprehensive settings management to meet these goals.
segment.target: Intune provides comprehensive settings management to meet these goals.
